explains: v. 给……装上空调器；用空调器调节（air-condition 的过去分词）

sentences.en: The building provides about 25,500 sq. ft. of air-conditioned offices.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑提供大约2.55万平方英尺的空调办公室。
凉爽、有空调的公寓变成了火炉。

sentences.en: I knew the theatre would be air-conditioned and I couldn't face my hot apartment.
sentences.cn: 我知道剧院里会开空调而我不能面对我闷热的公寓。
